summary: A struggling lawyer and volunteer wrestling coach's chicanery comes back to haunt him when the teenage grandson of the client he has double-crossed comes into his life.
cast: Paul Giamatti|Amy Ryan|Bobby Cannavale|Jeffrey Tambor|Burt Young|Melanie Lynskey|Alex Shaffer|Margo Martindale|David Thompson|Mike Diliello|Nina Arianda|Marcia Haufrecht|Sharon Wilkins|Clare Foley|Penelope Kindred|Sophie Kindred|Tim Ransom|Nicholas Somers|Jacqueline Brogan|Marceline Hugot|Michael Goodwin|Earl Baker Jr.|Edmund Ikeda|Lilly|Joseph Tiboni|Edwin Thompson|Pam Levine|Darren Goldstein|Michael D. Davey|Ann M. Hayes|Rudy Lanzillotta III|Christopher Lantz|Ryan Arnel|Kevin Antero|Chris Sarro|Dante Porrazzo|Dariusz M. Uczkowski|Chris Federlin|Nicholas 'Nick' Labarbera|Nicholas Lopez|Quinn Knauer|Austin Ward|Jonathan Anderson|Delon Richards|Chris Loew|Dean Shmuely|John Goncalves|Alexander Baliev|Jill DeMonstoy|Maria Di Angelis|Jason L. Koerner|Tom McArdle|Cliff Moylan|Brian James Pepe|Bejay Rose|Matthew Schuebel|Natasha Tax|Joanna Theobalds
title: Win Win (Ganamos todos)
